channel.title: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?
channel.description:
I've edited the pictures and used Tom's Cache Editor and packed it and all but my Donor Icon always looks like this. I'm not sure why.
[img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/9371/screenshot091t.jpg[/img]

item.title: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Change the white to pure magenta (FF00FF)

Read full topic
item.source: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?

item.title: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?
item.dc:creator: @Gizcat Gizcat
item.description:
@Gizcat wrote:

LOL did some random crap and it’s fixed. Win!

Read full topic
item.source: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?

item.title: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Set the background to magenta (0xFF00FF). And when it is drawing them for yell it is using a different method to actually render the sprite, so thats why it is different. Try to find the two different chunks of code and fix them

Read full topic
item.source: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?

item.title: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Well see thats the thing. The problem isn’t client sided as they work fine client sided but when the server grabs it, it has a black background.

Read full topic

item.title: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

Ripin, use toms cache suite modified. (its on rune-serba i believe). Or just use toms cache suite .55 or w/e. you can find it in there. (I assume you have looked for modIcons?)

Read full topic

item.title: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I wish i knew where my crowns on my client were loading from because they have the black background in yell. The normal chat works, just not when the server grabs them through <img=#>

Read full topic
item.source: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?

item.title: Why does my Donor Icon look like this?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Change the white to a purple-ish color. Purple is transparent. If that won’t work, try using photoshop to make the background transparent.

Read full topic
